definitions: a person whose job is to organize events or activities and to negotiate with others in order to ensure they work together effectively

examples.text: a full-time coordinator was appointed to oversee the referral process

shortDefinitions: person whose job is to organize events or activities

definitions: a word used to connect clauses, sentences, or words of equal syntactic importance (e.g. and, or, for)

examples.text: subordinate clauses can be connected with a coordinator

shortDefinitions: word used to connect clauses, sentences, or words of equal syntactic importance
